price: Na tukafanya ndani yake mabustani ya mitende na mizabibu, na tukatimbua chemchem ndani yake,
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَنَّٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ وَفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡعُيُونِ
footnotes: Na humo tukafanya vitalu na mabustani ya mitende na mizabibu, na tukapasua humo chemchem ya kumwagia maji kwenye miti yake, na ikatoa matunda, na wao wakala katika hayo. Na hayo si kazi ya mikono yao. Basi kwa nini hawatoi haki ya Mwenyezi Mungu iliyo juu yao kwa kumuamini na kumshukuru?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā jannātin min nakhīlin wa-aʿnābin wafajjarnā fīhā mina al-ʿuyūni
translations: and We caused to gush forth
